title: Rioters and PB Board
body:
I miss the good ole days when Riot posts were commonly seen on the behavior forums. Years ago you could almost always count on a Rioter stepping in and clearing up some non sense on a regular bases, it got to the point where you eagerly awaited a "smiting", knowing full well one was incomming.

Now a days this board contains a plethora of posts and posters that keep spreading their talking points and has become an echo chamber. They added mods, which perhaps they thought was a good substitute, but at best they provide calmness, and at worst are seen as Riot cheerleaders with an agenda.

The last red post was 19 days ago, the previous one 27 days. 

Solution: Add Riot to "Brahmoarqqplox" and i'll do the smiting that should never have left. Hell i'll do it for minimum wage.

Get at me Tantram.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1UGb0kzc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-07T23:41:17.015+0000)
>
> Hey.

I see where the other asshat vote came from (I was the other).

I know this isn't going anywhere boss, so as a compromise can you check out the 14 day ban dude that has like 5 threads open?

It's really what prompted this post as I feel like in the past Reds would have been all over it.

Good guy Brahmoar :)

This is a dangerously fast response time. It's like ordering take out and getting your food before hanging up the phone. No! That was clearly not freshly prepared! Send it back, wait 10 minutes, then deliver it.

Lol, well I tend to think I'm a fairly decent board member... but I'm a terrible person in game. I'd like to say I'm working on it, but something about the rift turns me into an ass.

It was a fast response, and I saw that he posted in the thread I mentioned earlier. Good guy Tantram making me look like a clown.

Heya - glad to see you back, hope your holidays were fun and relaxing.

Just a quick idea that you can either respond to or not, but have you considered having behavior player support assistants assist on the boards to clarify punishments?

Hey Tantram, it's been a while. Happy new year and glad you see you are kicking, alive and well. 

Are you guys still working on the project that is more compelling than monthly report cards? 

If so, got any timelines or sneakpeaks? Or did it get Iceboxed? Or were you reassigned to do other work like ranked 2019 and clash?

I enjoyed it, especially when it came to feeding bans. Before we could view games, people were constantly making up stories about what "really" happened  in the game. Then you find out they spent the first 5 mins following the jungler around, and canceling backs with anivia walls. Then, magically, the guy that has been posting every 30 seconds proclaiming his/her innocence suddenly went mia in said thread.

This post yet again feels more like Memes&Games.

Riot team was on holidays, give them a while to settle back, hmm?
